text: Gegeneophis krishni, the Gurupur caecilian, is a species of caecilian found in India. It is only known from its type locality Gurupur, near Mangalore in Karnataka, India. ==References== krishni Category:Amphibians of India Category:Endemic fauna of India Category:Fauna of Karnataka Category:Amphibians described in 1999
title: Gegeneophis krishni
